heroBlock.head: A European company with high-quality solutions
heroBlock.taglineBig: Your reliable assistant in ship servicing
heroBlock.description: NJORDMARINE cares about its customers and values their time, that's why we provide the necessary equipment, original and OEM spare parts, as well as servicing, in the shortest possible time and at a reasonable price.

servicesBlock.heading: Our services
servicesBlock.tagline: We care about our customers and provide the best service

advantagesBlock.heading: Our competitive advantages
advantagesBlock.tagline: What can you expect from us

geoBlock.heading: Coverage map
geoBlock.tagline: Work in progress around the world
geoBlock.text: We provide ship service worldwide, ensuring that our team of experienced professionals is always ready to provide qualified assistance to your vessel, no matter where in the world it is located.
geoBlock.text2: We are always ready to help you!

heroAboutBlock.text: NJORDMARINE is a family business based on trust and willingness to help in difficult times. Our team of specialists is ready for requests of any complexity.

abotFactBlock.tagline: 3 facts about our company that will interest you

list.text2: We provide assistance in improving the technical processes on board
list.text3: We take on tasks of any complexity

ourTeamBlock.text: Our team of experienced professionals is always ready to provide qualified assistance.
ourTeamBlock.position3: Head of Human Resources and Public Relations Department

auto.title: Automation of processes on a ship
auto.text: is to help customers automate safety-critical processes, as well as the most labor-intensive and regularly repeated operations.
auto.workTitle: We perform the following types of automation works

meintenance.title: Technical meintenance
meintenance.text1: We provide ultrasonic thickness measurement services for all types of vessels and have certificates from classification societies such as BV, DNV, ABS, RINA, and PMPS.
meintenance.text2: Our measurements at height are carried out by our certified technical climbers with DNV and ABS classification society certificates for the relevant work.
meintenance.measurTagline: Measurement of thickness consists of the following stages

onBoard.title: On-board solution
onBoard.head: Your first step towards reducing fuel consumption and improving operational effiency of the vessel
onBoard.text: Our system integrates seamlessly with other onboard systems installed on the vessel, allowing for the display of all necessary parameters.
onBoard.optionsTitle: Parameters monitored by the system installed on board the ship

contacts.text: Fill out the form and our team will contact you shortly.

servicesListConfig.name1: Automation of processes on a ship

advantages.text1: We offer our service 24/7, seven days a week
advantages.text2: The best prices and high quality of spare parts, equipment and work
advantages.text3: High delivery speed with minimal logistics costs
advantages.text4: We constantly monitor the time of spare parts readiness and delivery of pending orders.
advantages.text5: Minimum six months warranty on all parts and labor
advantages.text6: Advanced technology solutions for efficient fleet management

works.text1: Automation of starting, stopping, and monitoring processes of main engines, diesel generators, boilers, pumps, and other equipment
works.text2: Fuel consumption monitoring system and control of ship machinery condition
works.text5: Automatic control of the machinery operation and maintenance of operational documentation
works.text7: Measuring tank levels with output of information to ship panels
works.text10: Planned maintenance system for the vessel

measurements.text1: Preliminary inspection of the location for residual thicknesses measurements and agreement on the scope of work
measurements.text2: Coordination of inspection programs with the classification society inspector
measurements.text3: Measurement of the thickness of steel structures of ships and onshore terminals
measurements.text4: Compiling reports on performed works in accordance with the rules of classification societies
measurements.text5: Preparation of repair drawings using detailed weight tables

consumers.title: The main consumers
consumers.text1: Fuel consumption of main engines, auxiliary engines, boilers (hourly, cumulative consumption, for a specific, selected period of time) is monitored by the system
consumers.text3: Engine speed and load of the main engines and diesel generators

control.title: Control of bunker fuel
control.text2: The mass, density, and temperature of the fuel during bunkering
control.text3: The time of cargo reception/delivery process

option.title: Vessel parameters
option.text3: Control of the ship's consumers' condition

focus.title: FOCUS System for Fleet
focus.text: is a fuel and energy efficiency monitoring and management system for fleet
focus.head: How does the FOCUS system work?
focus.text2: Clear interaction between the fleet and the office will help to streamline all processes at a high level and reduce further expenses.
focus.titleBottom: The FOCUS system has been developed to perform all these processes as a single product

config.text1: Collecting data from the entire fleet
config.text4: Issuing recommendations to increase vessel energy efficiency

options.text1: Reducing the time required to perform all statistical processes
options.text4: Storing data on a customer-friendly platform
options.text5: Recommendations provided by the system to reduce costs

office.title: Office solution
office.text2: you can easily monitor all the vessel's operational parameters with subsequent online adjustments
office.head: The system displays and allows you to monitor the following parameters

list.text1: Instantaneous fuel consumption, temperature, fuel density of main engines, diesel generators, and boiler
list.text4: Vessel speed and position on the map at a given moment in time
list.text6: Wind force and direction relative to the vessel
list.text7: Control of the bunkering process with subsequent report generation
list.text8: History of vessel voyages/berths in port
list.text9: Fuel consumption by consumers for a certain period of time (history)

afterSendEmail.text: Thank you for contacting us! Our specialists will get in touch with you shortly.
